item.title: Thoughts after one year using Amazon's KDP
item.description: Time flies by. That’s a known fact. It’s been more than a year since I published [Build Systems with Go]({% link _pages/2021-04-05-build-systems-with-go.md %}). I have already talked about [how does it feel to write a programming book]({% post_url 2021-04-05-writing-a-programming-book-in-2021 %}).
